website_summaries.verdict: If you are shopping for a fun and pretty LEGO set for a child who loves Frozen, chances are this feature-packed Disney option will entertain and impress – just keep in mind you may need to help build it.
pros: Perfect for young Frozen fans, as it features characters and themes from the popular movie
Comes with Elsa and Anna mini-figures
Kids love building it and playing with the castle once it's all put together
cons: Not as versatile as some others on our shortlist
Younger children may need adult assistance to build it

customer_reviews.title: Fun lego set
customer_reviews.text: I love this castle. So much so that I haven't taken this set apart after building it, yet. On display and brings a smile -even when I dust it. I am embarrassed to say how old I am and how much fun I had putting this set together. My grandson "helped", but really I have to confess that I bought this set because it was just so cute. Also, an opportunity to build with the grand children on a snowy day, but really a set for myself. Always been a fan of Lego because there is a set for every interest.
customer_reviews.author: Julzbe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy
customer_reviews.text: Is beautiful with nice details, my 9 years old put it together and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Lego Toys
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and purchase. Love to purchase from Amazon. Fast shipping, service and fair prices. Item came as described and on-time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mullaly

customer_reviews.title: Adorable lego set
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter and husband love this set! My husband is slightly obsessed with legos so he put it together quickly and my daughter sits and plays with the castle for hours. Anna and Elsa are so similar to the actual movie figures and the olafs are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For Frozen fan ;)
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Expensive but worth to buy it. Includes Elsa and Anna mini-doll figures, Olaf and three mini snowmen and lots of other little pieces (balloon, cake etc) to play for hours with it. We have Elsa's castle too so it's perfect pair for lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kukac

customer_reviews.title: An excellent set! This was our daughter's first Lego set
customer_reviews.text: An excellent set! This was our daughter's first Lego set, and she was consumed by it - never wanted to stop! Though of course we had to, but she was very focused. She is five, and so she needed our help all along the way, but we certainly weren't doing it for her. I taught her to check off a page when it was completed so she could stay in order and keep track of where she was. What a great challenge, and so beautiful with lots of playing options when completed so it doesn't just sit on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jeanne Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: My youngest daughter is really into Legos, and even though she is only five, she was thrilled to receive this one designed for slightly older kids. She had help assembling it from her older siblings but was quick to tear it apart later and make her own miniature sets for Elsa and Anna to have adventures with. While I think most Lego sets like these are way overpriced, it still gets five stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present hit
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present and the granddaughters love it. There are small parts so care should be taken to give this to the appropriate age child. Hours of fun for the little girls. Not one of those "play with it once or twice then put it away". They are almost always playing with Arendelle's castle.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Unless your child is very good at assembling these items
customer_reviews.text: Unless your child is very good at assembling these items, I would suggest not purchasing this for a child under 8 UNLESS you plan on doing it with them. This is adorable and we had a lot of fun putting it together but my 6 year old never could've done this alone.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Wolf

customer_reviews.title: She finished it beautifully with a little guidance
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 4-years-old for her 1st lego set. She finished it beautifully with a little guidance. She is super excited and enjoyed playing with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful parent child opp to play together
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful play set, but needs an adult to help younger age kids set it up
customer_reviews.author: Barri M. Blauvelt

customer_reviews.title: Fans of Frozen and Lego will love this!
customer_reviews.text: Another great Lego product. Purchased for a 6 year old who was able to assemble with very little assistance. The smile on her face when complete...priceless! If you have a fan of Frozen, and love Legos, this is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: E. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great lego's.
customer_reviews.text: My beautiful granddaughter loves to play with her friends. And I might add her folks. I play when I visit from Virginia.😍😍🐶🐶

customer_reviews.text: The castle is much smaller than expected but it is very colorful, has lots of detail and little cute objects, but an adult is necessary to put it together. I mean a child can follow the step by step instructions but the pieces are so tiny in some cases that I cant see my 6-year old doing it until she is 10-12 years old.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves building Legos. Shes four and can follow ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves building Legos. Shes four and can follow the directions and built this herself. She prefers that I put on any decals. Subtract one star because everything Lego is so overpriced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: LEGO used to have the best precision
customer_reviews.text: LEGO used to have the best precision, but not on this set. The instruction miscounts numbers of parts on Page 29, and sticker number 4 and 7 are flipped on page 49 to make them difficult to align. The small round printed plate with the image of a lock is drifted to the left. Without these problems this set would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: YZ

customer_reviews.title: We want more!
customer_reviews.text: Cute lego set. Sure dont make them like they used to, that's a great thing too. Legos have come a long way! Keeps the little ones busy for hours at a time! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JLN7880

customer_reviews.title: Lovely quality set!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a great afternoon with my kid building this castle. It's very pretty and has a lot of detail. Another quality Lego set!

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is a little disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Lego friends for many times,but at this time it lost a glass cup in a bag. My daughter is a little disappointed!

product_meta.title: LEGO Disney Frozen Arendelle Castle Celebration 41068 Disney Toy
product_meta.description:
No information available at this time. The text is not available nor finalized. It will be provided as soon as possible.

BRAND STORY
By LEGO
feature_bullets: Build Disney Princess Arendelle’s royal castle and recreate Elsa and Anna’s magical adventures!
Featuring characters and settings from Disney’s Frozen
Includes Elsa and Anna mini-doll figures, Olaf and three mini snowmen
LEGO Disney Frozen building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Arendelle Castle measures over 10” high, 8” wide and 5” deep
477 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 6 and 12 years old

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars293 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
